reviewsJson.markdown:
Percentage Used: 2.5%

Equipment Used: Velocity clone at 0.3 Ohms, NC2 at about 75W

PG/VG:  25/75

Aged:  19 Days

Taste:  like the 'marshmallows' in Lucky Charms cereal.  No milk or oats, just the marshmallows bits.  It's not much like campfire marshamallow or Fluff marshmallow cream.

Sensations:  Some sweetness, similar to the taste of powdered sugar, appropriate to marshmallows.

Notes:  At 2.5% the mix is strong, it could be used as stand alone.  At this percentage, I expect it to be noticed in a mix.
I didn't detect any off flavors.

Uses:  A good candidate for a Lucky Charms cerial mix or a chocolate mix.
reviewsJson.author: VAPORMARK
reviewsJson.title: Marshmallow Candy SC
